markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gravity Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1763) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your expertise with your weapons and commitment to taking out your targets lends you magical power. You gain the [_gravity weapon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=770) warden spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.
name: Gravity Weapon
